channel.title: Wasteland Monuments
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Wasteland Monuments"

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded: Lokumun stop thinking of the 2x ash covered as probability. It is not. To make this clear. if you have a 50% chance of getting something you still don't get it if you are unlucky even if you get two at once. If your luck is as mine you will win once in 3-4 tries.

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded:
I have 12 ash-covereds on me right now; I'll test it out next 90% treasure day.

And yes, as it has already been said, use ichi ramen when you get the ramen shop, Spice and Wolf, diagnosis, and theme, and you will get a virtually 100% drop rate. Well, if you think about it, that's a 24x drop rate (2x2x2x3). So as long as runes are above 4.16%, you've got 100%.

And Spice and Wolf doubles ash covered items, so that's really a 200% item find. Also, something to remember with Spice and Wolf: not only do they give you 2x ash covered items, but also a double ally/item find rate. So they really give you 4x find. Much better than Haus.

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded:
good theory. lets test it guys

save your runes for 2-3 days. appraise on 90%+ treasure day

@ Ren: yea ive appraised 15 and gotten 1 non -worthless and then got bonus stamina, another 2 runes. fox, lightning XD

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded: Thats a really good point ren po ken.

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded:
I've appraised over fifty at once and gotten no runes.

I've appraised four and gotten three.

Honestly, it wouldn't surprise me if it was somehow linked to the treasure prices.

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded: im very lucky with runes. i appraise 5 at a time about and one is a non worthless usually.

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded: Those are RARE to get. personly I have only gotten 1 of 35, which are non-worthless

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded:
I have goten about a dozen runes and all of them are worthless.

-Sasoriza

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded: lol Season 3. yea, i should probably finish The Trade for once. those themes can be useful

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded: If you're season 1 then you couldn't do it anyway. But if you've got the My Name Is theme then you can use that instead. Post Recode this probably won't be an issue.

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded: i dont do monochrome, sorry. though i have thought about sight beyond sight as a "maybe ill try it" but my village doesnt have tools of the trade

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded: If you're serious about Rune Farming, loose Haus and use Spice and Wolf (Larry+Haro after you do the Wish Around The World Special Mission) and use Sight Beyond Sight if you can (season 2+ RedEye item). Spice and Wolf doubles your find rate (literally, you get 2 runes instead of 1). The other stuff suggested is also good.

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded: with your set i found the drop rate to be 75% when i was hunting ruins.

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded:
New village. I dont have the ninja cooking school yet :(

I used to do that though.

item.title: Re: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded: I use haus, stand by ninja theme, diagnosis jutsu, AND ichi ramen. This gets me a rune every time for the mission. Helps a lot.

item.title: Wasteland Monuments
item.content:encoded:
Does anyone know the approximate drop percent of the runes in the Wastelands?

Seriously, I use Haus, x2 Find theme, and Diagnosis Jutsu; haha no rune for you….. >=O

by the way Uzuki, your monument is notorious for not dropping xD
